Reign of Anger.name: Reign of Anger
Reign of Anger.blurb: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.
Reign of Anger.description: Innate: Renekton generates  5 Fury each time he lands a basic attack on an enemy, and loses 4 Fury per second if he hasn't dealt or taken damage in the last 12 seconds.
Reign of Anger.description2: When at or above 50 Fury, Renekton's next basic ability consumes 50 Fury to enhance its effects. The enhanced ability does not generate Fury.
Reign of Anger.description3: Reign of Anger: Renekton generates 50% bonus Fury from all sources while  below 50% of his maximum health.
Reign of Anger.notes: * Renekton generates Fury by collecting Health Relics on  Howling Abyss (interacts with Reign of Anger's bonus generation).

Cull the Meek.name: Cull the Meek
Cull the Meek.blurb: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
Cull the Meek.description: Active: Renekton deals  physical damage to all nearby enemies and  heals himself for each unit hit, up to a cap.
Cull the Meek.leveling:
Physical Damage:
65 / 100 / 135 / 170 / 205 (+ 80% bonus AD)
Enhanced Physical Damage:
100 / 150 / 200 / 250 / 300 (+ 120% bonus AD)

Non-Champion Healing:
3 / 4.5 / 6 / 7.5 / 9 (+ 4% bonus AD)
Enhanced Non-Champion Healing:
9 / 13.5 / 18 / 22.5 / 27 (+ 12% bonus AD)

Healing Cap:
50 / 75 / 100 / 125 / 150
Enhanced Healing Cap:
200 / 300 / 400 / 500 / 600
Cull the Meek.description2: Renekton also generates  2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per cast capped at 30.
Cull the Meek.description3: Against champions the healing is increased by 300%.
Cull the Meek.leveling3:
Champion Healing:
12 / 18 / 24 / 30 / 36 (+ 16% bonus AD)
Enhanced Champion Healing:
36 / 54 / 72 / 90 / 108 (+ 48% bonus AD)
Cull the Meek.description4: Reign of Anger: Cull the Meek deals additional damage, increases the total healing by 200%, and the healing cap by 300%.
Cull the Meek.notes:
* Cull the Meek has a 0.25 seconds cast time and does not interrupt Renekton's previous orders.
  Spirit Visage and  Grievous Wounds take effect after Cull the Meek's healing cap.

Ruthless Predator.name: Ruthless Predator
Ruthless Predator.blurb: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
Ruthless Predator.description: Active: Renekton's next basic attack within 7 seconds gains  50 bonus range and strikes his target twice dealing  modified physical damage and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds. Each hit applies on-hit effects and grants  Fury. Hitting an enemy  champion grants 10 bonus Fury.
Ruthless Predator.leveling:
Total Physical Damage:
10 / 30 / 50 / 70 / 90 (+ 150% AD)
Physical Damage Per Hit:
5 / 15 / 25 / 35 / 45 (+ 75% AD)
Ruthless Predator.description2: Reign of Anger: Renekton destroys and ignores all  shields on the target before striking them 3 times, dealing 50% bonus damage and increasing the  stun duration to 1.5 seconds.
Ruthless Predator.description3: Ruthless Predator resets Renekton's basic attack timer.
Ruthless Predator.notes:
* Ruthless Predator has a 0.5 seconds cast time during which Renekton cannot perform any actions (can use summoner spells as well as active ability items).
 Ruthless Predator's cast time can be dual cast with active ability items that play one of their own  ( Tiamat's Crescent).
 Ruthless Predator's cast time can be canceled with  Dominus'.

 The basic attack can  critically strike as normal (the modified damage cannot).

Slice.name: Slice
Slice.blurb: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
Slice.description: Active - Slice: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing physical damage to all enemies he passes through.
Slice.description2: Hitting an enemy allows Renekton to cast Dice within the next 4 seconds.
Slice.notes:
* Movement speed has minimal to no impact on the dash speed.
 PENDING FOR TEST: Renekton can cast Dice even if Slice is blocked.

Dice.name: Dice
Dice.blurb: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
Dice.description: Active - Dice: Renekton  dashes in the target direction, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies he passes through.
Dice.description2: Both Slice and Dice generate  2 Fury for each non-champion hit, and 10 Fury for each champion hit, with the Fury generated per dash capped at 30.
Dice.description3: Reign of Anger: Dice deals additional damage to all enemies and reduces their  armor for 4 seconds.
Dice.leveling3:
Enhanced Physical Damage:
70 / 115 / 160 / 205 / 250 (+ 135% bonus AD)
Total Enhanced Damage:
110 / 185 / 260 / 335 / 410 (+ 225% bonus AD)

Armor Reduction:
25 / 27.5 / 30 / 32.5 / 35%
Dice.notes:
* Movement speed has minimal to no impact on the dash speed.
 PENDING FOR TEST: Renekton can cast Dice even if Slice is blocked.

Dominus.name: Dominus
Dominus.blurb: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
Dominus.description: Active: Renekton empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining  bonus health, increased size,  25 bonus range and  20 Fury.
Dominus.description2: For the duration, he deals  magic damage each half second to all nearby enemies and generates 5 Fury per second, up to a maximum of 75 Fury.
Dominus.leveling2:
Magic Damage Per Half Second:
20 / 30 / 40 / 50 / 60 (+ 10% AP)
Total Magic Damage:
600 / 900 / 1200 / 1500 / 1800 (+ 300% AP)
Dominus.notes:
* Dominus' range increase does not stack with  Ruthless Predator.
 Dominus' cooldown starts on-cast (is not refunded if Renekton is killed during the cast animation).
 Dominus' bonus health gain does not interact with  Spirit Visage or  Grievous Wounds.
 Renekton retains Dominus' bonus health (if not over his normal maximum) once the duration ends.
